mapper.select: select * from plan where plan_sender_no = #{memberNo} and plan_type = '개인' order by plan_start_time asc
mapper.update: update plan set plan_status = #{planStatus} where plan_no = #{planNo}
mapper.select: select p.plan_no, p.plan_title, p.plan_sender_no, p.plan_content, p.plan_color, p.plan_start_time, p.plan_end_time, p.plan_is_all_day, p.plan_status, m.member_name as plan_sender_name, m.member_department as plan_sender_department from plan p join member m on p.plan_sender_no = m.member_no where p.plan_start_time between #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd}
